PersonalStatement.text: Benjamin Dickson, born on 1967-02-28, is a Female based in East Lucas, Brunei Darussalam. She is Single and holds Peruvian nationality. Currently working at Gutierrez, Gonzalez and Esparza.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Boyd-Smith from 2010 to 2017.
Senior HR Manager at Gutierrez, Gonzalez and Esparza, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Dongguk University
Master's in Engineering from Universidade Nova de Lisboa

PersonalSkills.text: Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys running marathons.
